description.hltext_display: Zrodení z hriechu
description.content:
Panghart, bastard, prespankino dieťa, ale aj dieťa lásky či dieťa náhody - to je len niekoľko označení detí narodených mimo manželského zväzku.
Ľudia poznačení stigmou nelegitímnosti museli v živote prekonať mnohé ťažkosti a prekážky. Spoločnosť sa k nim zväčša stavala odmietavo, zažívali hanbu a zanedbávanie, čelili posmechu a opovrhovaniu. Táto kniha vás oboznámi so životnými osudmi pozoruhodných historických postáv, ktoré prekonali biľag nemanželského pôvodu a v histórii zanechali výraznú stopu. Sú medzi nimi Leonardo Da Vinci, Viliam Dobyvateľ, Fidel Castro a iní.
• autor: Juré Fiorillo
• väzba: tvrdá
• formát: 190 x 240 mm
• rozsah: 272 strán
• EAN 9788089379279
Zdroj: FORTUNA LIBRI SK,
Kontextové reklamné odkazy
Čakáme bábätko
21.12.2010
Tento jedinečný sprievodca tehotenstvom s viac než 200 farebnými fotografiami vám umožní sledovať vývoj plodu a monitorovať váš zdravotný stav, ale aj uvedomiť si nezabudnuteľné chvíle, ktoré sa spájajú s očakávaním dieťatka.
Tiene zostavajú
20.12.2010
„Dráždivý, elektrizujúci a temný,“ píše Amazon o knihe Petra de Jonga Tiene zostávajú. Je rok 2005, Deň vďakyvzdania a Kate Mossová s odhalenými prsiami sa díva z veľkého bilbordu na dažďom zaliatu Houstonovu ulicu. Do mesta prichádza desivou minulosťou zaťažená Francesca Penová, aby začala znovu žiť. Nik však nevie, kto skutočne Francesca je... a zrazu vo Veľkom jablku zmizne krásna mladá žena.
Roman Kaliský-Hronský: Dajte Sizyfovi elevátor!
20.12.2010
Táto knižka poviedok od vydavateľstva Pectus, výrečná predovšetkým realistickou obraznosťou, hádže rukavicu nielen najzdatnejším slovenským poviedkarom. Napríklad hlavný hrdina Slávo sa v mylnej domnienke, že labute primrzli k ľadu, pokúsi zachrániť nádherné tvory, aby do prvého odmäku neuhynuli (poviedka Jazero).
Vychovávame dieťa
20.12.2010
V tejto knihe získate rady, ako byť dobrým rodičom a vychovať zdravé, šťastné dieťa.
100 najzdravších jedál pre budúce mamičky
19.12.2010
Kniha odborníkov - lekárov - poskytuje informácie a rady o každej z dôležitých stránok správnej výživy v období tehotnosti.
Jonny Bowden: Najúčinnejšie liečivá z prírodnej lekárne
18.12.2010
Uznávaný odborník na výživu Jonny Bowden v knihe Najúčinnejšie liečivá z prírodnej lekárne odhaľuje a vysvetľuje to najlepšie z alternatívnej medicíny.
Nový Crichton a jeho Pirátska odysea
17.12.2010
Michael Crichton patrí medzi najobľúbenejších autorov na svete, deväť jeho kníh bolo sfilmovaných (Jurský park, Kongo, Kmeň Andromeda, Stratený svet) a autorsky sa podieľal na úspešnom televíznom seriáli Pohotovosť. Čoskoro vyjde jeho posledná kniha Pirátska odysea, neodolateľné dobrodružstvo povestných pirátov v Novom svete... klasický príbeh o poklade a zrade.
Přežili...! Poslední primitivní kmeny světa
17.12.2010
Napriek civilizačným trendom a globalizácii si zachovali tradičný spôsob života. Máme ich ľutovať, alebo im závidieť? Táto kniha predstavuje posledné rezíduá praveku na našej planéte.

description.hltext_display: Tuningolja autóit a Nissan
description.content:
A nemrég az európai Év Autójának megválasztott Nissan Leaf-fel kapcsolatban sok minden beugrik az embernek, de a sportosság forgalma biztosan nincs közöttük. Egyelőre azon izzadnak a gyártók, hogy növeljék a hatótávolságot, úgyhogy nem foglalkoznak azzal, hogyan tudnák javítani a menetteljesítményeket. Kereskedői extrákkal csinosították ki a Juke-ot A Juke esetén már nem légből kapott tanulmányt kreáltak, a Sporty Package nem más, mint a kereskedő által be/felszerelt extrák összessége. Krómozott kiegészítők és 17 colos felnik teszik még különlegesebbé az egyébként se hétköznapi autó megjelenését.
Új megjelenést adtak a Micrának A Nissan Micra esetén ennél azért többet tettek. A March (Japánban így hívják a Micrát) Bolero nevű speciális szériája hatalmas méretű hűtőrácsot kap, utasterében pedig erőteljes vízszintes mintával rendelkező kárpit teszi egyedivé a hangulatot. Arról nincs hír, hogy ez eljut-e Európába, de abból kiindulva, hogy csak egy új lökhárítóra van szükség hozzá, biztosan lesz egy-két megszállott, aki hozat ilyet magának.

description.hltext_display: Jet-setting Najib's trips cost nearly RM9m
description.author: Patrick Lee, Free Malaysia Today
description.content:
Since taking over the reins in April, 2009, Prime Minister Najib Tun Razak has spent nearly RM9 million on foreign trips.
PKR Senator Syed Husin Ali revealed a list containing details of the trips in the Parliament lobby this morning.
The list, provided by the Prime Minister's Deparment, showed that Najib had gone on 42 official trips abroad which cost RM8,724,895.91.
The most expensive of these trips were visits to Japan, the United States and Vietnam. The trips cost RM2,094,635.39 and took place between April 5 and 22 this year.
Najib's first outing overseas was to Thailand on April 10, 2009 – a mere week after he took over from former prime minister Abdullah Ahmad Badawi. It cost RM78,507.55.
Other notable trips included a nine-day trip to France from Oct 1 to 9 in 2009, where Najib spent a total of RM630,467.
The most expensive trip to a single country took place between Sept 20 and Oct 8 this year, when the premier spent RM1,043,923 in a visit to the US.
He also spent vastly different amounts in two separate trips to Thailand.
In his trip to Thailand from Nov 23 to 25, Najib spent a mere RM3,346.08.
Two weeks later, in his Dec 6 to 10 Thailand trip, he incurred a cost of RM84,572.04.
"I want to know what is the real profit from all these trips overseas, and what is the return from all this expenditure," Syed Husin told the press.
The senator also revealed that Najib had spent 274 days out of his 588 days in office (up to Nov 19, 2010) overseas.
This earned considerable ire from Syed Husin, who accused the prime minister of spending half his time overseas, when he should have been taking care of the country's problems.
Asked if he knew the size of Najib's entourage in his overseas trips, Syed Husin he said, "We don't know his (exact) expenses, or the size of his (entourage)."
He also said that the premier brought his wife, Rosmah Mansor, on many of these trips.
However, he could not elaborate which trips were attended by Rosmah.
Meanwhile, the senator also revealed that the three-day First Ladies Summit from Oct 13 incurred expenses of up to RM4.498 million.

event_or_fact.property: the premier brought his wife, Rosmah Mansor, on many of these trips.
I want to know what is the real profit from all these trips overseas, and what is the return from all this expenditure
We don't know his (exact) expenses, or the size of his (entourage).

description.hltext_display: Une beta 8 pour Firefox 4
description.content:
Oui, vous avez bien lu : Mozilla vient de sortir la 8ème beta de son navigateur Firefox 4, qui pour le coup apporte une liste de correction de bugs longue comme le bras. A côté de ça, on notera principalement une amélioration de la gestion de Firefox Sync et de WebGL également. Enfin, Mozilla a de toutes façons annoncé qu’il fallait tabler sur 2 autres beta avant la sortie de la version définitive de son navigateur, et qu’il fallait aussi s’attendre à l’implantation d’un mode “furtif”, qui permettra à l’utilisateur de véritablement contrôler les cookies utilisés par les pontes de la publicités afin de cibler ses habitudes de surf. A voir dans la pratique…
Bref, pour télécharger cette beta 8, suivez le lien !

description.hltext_display: Morcheeba actuarà al 10è aniversari del Black Music
description.content:
El festival de Salt combina l'homenatge als artistes que ja hi han passat amb una mirada al futur
VOTI AQUESTA NOTÍCIA
SALT | MARTA PALLARÈS Deu anys des d'aquella primera nit del Festival de Blues de Salt, que va ser la llavor del Black Music Festival. Deu edicions del festival amb l'ànima més negra (i amb molta honra) de Girona, i que ?l'any vinent bufarà deu espelmes allargant la seva programació i amb un cartell que es preveu d'autèntic luxe, tenint en compte les primeres confirmacions que es van fer ahir: el trip hop influït pel blues de Morcheeba; una de les millors veus del soul de finals del XX, James Hunter; i l'artista favorita del president dels Estats Units, Barack Obama, la jove Esperanza Spalding. A més, val a dir que en el cas dels dos primers artistes el de Salt serà l'únic concert que ofereixin a l'Estat l'any vinent.
La filosofia del festival, que se celebrarà entre l'11 de març i el 15 d'abril, és crear una edició que sigui "un punt i seguit en la programació artística". D'aquesta manera, el concert inaugural de la Black Music Experience homenatjarà els artistes que han passat per aquests 10 anys de festival (amb noms propis com els de Chuck Berry, Bill Wyman, John Mayall o Spin Doctors), però alhora fer un pas endavant apostant pel present de la música negra.
En el cas de Morcheeba, actuaran el 2 d'abril liderats per la seva cantant original, Skye Edwards; la mítica banda demostrarà perquè temes com Rome wasn't built in a day, World looking inLet me see han escrit part de la història de música negra dels 90.
En el cas de James Hunter, està considerat un "clàssic actual", ja que amb la seva combinació de soul, rhythm'n'blues i rock podria haver triomfat perfectament als anys 50; però no, va sorgir al tombant de segle XXI convertint-se en una de les veus més especials de l'escena negra actual. Qui també pot presumir de veu és la jove Esperanza Spalding, que amb només 25 anys és un dels valors més ferms del nou panorama jazzístic.
A banda, l'1 d'abril es comptarà amb SFDK, una de les bandes històriques del hip hop estatal.

description.hltext_display: S&P 500 companies more than double 3rd quarter buybacks
description.content:
BOSTON - Companies are using extra cash built up during the recession to repurchase stock, moves that are likely to please investors who see the value of their shares rise.
But the buyback surge may not please President Obama, who is urging companies to instead use surplus cash to hire more workers, hoping to generate jobs to sustain the economic recovery.
Standard & Poor's reported Monday that stock repurchases by S&P 500 companies more than doubled to $79.6 billion in the July-to-September period from $34.9 billion in last year's third quarter.
It was the fifth consecutive quarter of increasing buyback activity among the 500 largest publicly traded companies, many of them with substantial cash holdings built up during and after the recession that officially ended in mid-2009.
Stock buybacks indicate companies have enough cash to take their shares off the market, which increases the value of investors' remaining shares, and boosts per-share earnings results.
Buyback growth in the latest quarter "marks the full return of corporate participation in the equity markets," S&P analyst Howard Silverblatt said. "While we do not expect a return to the 2005-2007 buyback bonanza, we do see this as a strong, positive sign for the overall health of the market."
However, stock repurchases aren't rebounding as rapidly as they were earlier. The latest quarter's buyback figure is up just 3 percent from the second quarter's total of $77.6 billion. That's a significant slowdown from double-digit percentage increases in each of the preceding four quarter-to-quarter comparisons.
Obama met at the White House last week with 20 CEOs, urging corporate America to shake loose $1.9 trillion in untapped cash and create more jobs by hiring and investing in their businesses. Obama is trying to cut a national unemployment rate that rose to 9.8 percent in November and is slowing the broader economic recovery.
But many companies are reluctant to take cash off the sidelines, fearing consumer demand for the goods and services they provide is still too meager to support more hiring or capital spending. Companies also are reluctant to spend until the outlook for new government regulations becomes more clear. The latter worry could ease because of last week's congressional agreement to keep in place Bush era tax rates.
When companies build up cash from rising profits, their options include hiring more workers, investing in capital spending or acquisitions, buying back stock, and raising dividends paid to shareholders.
Many companies have been opting for the latter two, which please shareholders.
Much of the recent buyback surge has been driven by technology companies, which fared better than most corporations through the recession because they entered it with relatively little debt, and have seen demand for their products hold up. In the latest quarter, information technology companies, including Microsoft Corp., Hewlett-Packard Co. and IBM Corp., made up nearly 29 percent of all buybacks, up from 27 percent in the second quarter.
Wal-Mart Stores Inc. and Exxon Mobil Corp. were among the other names making large buybacks in the latest quarter.
Health care companies repurchased less stock, with their share of buybacks slipping to 13 percent in the third quarter from 19 percent in the second.
Silverblatt expects a slight overall increase in buybacks in the fourth quarter. For the first part of next year, he expects companies will continue to be cautious and refrain from purchasing an excessive amount of shares.
Dividend payouts by U.S. corporations also are expected to rise this year. Third-quarter dividend payouts totaled $51.3 billion for S&P 500 companies, and are nearly back to their first-quarter 2009 level of $51.7 billion.
But Silverblatt said last week that payouts likely won't return to 2008 levels until 2013.
More about 500
ARTICLE: Little gets new position with Hagadone Hospitality
More about Billion
ARTICLE: Eurozone says bailout funds enough ... for now
ARTICLE: Merck 3Q profit plunges 90 percent

description.hltext_display: 中国上调汽柴油价格 汽油价格每吨提高310元
description.content:
http://www.qianlong.com/2010-12-22 06:11:15千龙网
新华网北京12月21日电（记者 江国成）国家发展和改革委员会21日宣布，自22日零时起将汽油、柴油价格分别提高每吨310元、300元，相当于90号汽油全国平均零售价每升上调0.23元，0号柴油每升上调0.26元。
发展改革委价格司副司长刘振秋说，10月26日上调国内成品油价格以来，国际市场原油价格持续震荡上扬。到目前为止，国际市场原油连续22个工作日移动平均价格超过4％，按照现行成品油价格形成机制，应适当上调国内成品油价格。“综合考虑当前物价形势以及成品油市场供求状况，国家适当推迟了提价时间，控制了提价幅度”。
据发展改革委介绍，12月20日，美国西德克萨斯原油和英国北海布伦特原油期货价格分别涨至每桶88.81美元和92.74美元，达到2008年10月初以来的最高水平。
这次成品油调价后，中国政府将按照既定的补贴政策，继续对种粮农民、渔业、林业、城市公交、农村道路客运给予补贴，对出租车行业给予临时补贴。
中国财政部经济建设司有关负责人告诉记者，考虑到近年来柴油提价对种粮成本影响，明年中央政府将进一步提高对种粮农民农资综合补贴水平，切实保护种粮农民利益。各地将综合考虑成品油、液化气等价格调整和其他居民生活必需品价格上涨等因素，继续做好城乡低保对象等困难群体基本生活保障工作。
发展改革委强调，为控制调价连锁反应，这次成品油调价后，城市公交、农村道路客运、铁路客货运价格、民航燃油附加标准均不提高。从严控制公路客运价格调整。这次成品油调价直接影响当月居民价格总水平环比上升约0.07个百分点。
刘振秋表示，这次成品油价格调整有利于调动石油企业生产和进口的积极性，保障国内市场供应，同时抑制不合理消费，促进节能减排和经济结构调整。
他说，去年中国石油对外依存度达到53％。今年1－10月，中国进口原油1.98亿吨，同比增长20％，预计全年对外依存度接近55％。充分发挥价格杠杆的调节和引导作用，抑制石油消费过快增长，促进经济发展方式转变和资源节约是现实、必然的选择。

description.hltext_display: COSGA descends on defaulters
description.content:
Accra, Dec. 21, GNA - The Interim Copyright Management Team of the Copyright Society of Ghana (COSGA), has descended on users of copyright works such as music, film, literally works, for non-payment of copyright fees.
Mr Stanley Sackey, Board member of COSGA, told the Ghana News Agency in Accra on Monday after an inspection exercise that management had organised many radio, television and newspaper education campaigns on copyright fees' payment in anticipation that users complied with the law.
He noted that the worst offenders were owners of night clubs, drinking sports, radio and television stations, among others.
"On the contrary, most of the users of musical works, have decided to unilaterally disregard the humble call from management (COSGA) to pay for what they are using," he added.
Mr Sackey explained that the refusal to pay these fees motivated the team to randomly inspect receipts and licenses of users to ensure they were in good standing.
He said according to the law copyright Act 2005 (Act 690) states that anybody, who used copyright work be it music, film or literally work without authorisation commits an offence which is liable on summary conviction.
He said it also amounted to a fine one not more than GH¢1,000 penalty units and not less than GH¢500 penalty units or a term of imprisonment of not more than three years or to both.
He cautioned members of the public that uploading and downloading music onto computers, phones was an offence punishable by law.
A number of foreign nationals operating in the drinking spot and night club business, who spoke to GNA, said they were not aware of the copyright law and more education should be organised for them.
Some said they did not understand the language and urged management to be considerate when dealing with them in terms of payment.
The Association wished to inform the general public especially copyright users of the ongoing inspection and urged all defaulters to pay their copyright fess or stop using music publicly, adding that "management may have no option other than to put injunction on all recalcitrant users not to play music throughout festive season."
The exercise took the team to areas like Osu, Kokomlemle, Adabraka, Dansoman, and Kaneshie all in the Accra Metropolis.

description.hltext_display: New York lawsuit's effect on local Ernst & Young offices unclear
description.content:
Andrew Cuomo, New York's attorney general, filed a civil suit Tuesday against the accounting firm of Ernst & Young LLP alleging fraud.
It's not yet clear if there are any effects from the lawsuit that impact Detroit operations.
The lawsuit alleges fraud in the temporary removal of $50 billion in highly leveraged assets from the balance sheet of Lehman Bros. Holdings Inc., prior to its collapse its 2008.
In a 32-page complaint, Cuomo, who will become governor of New York in the new year, asked that the firm be ordered to pay the state of New York the $150 million in fees it was paid by Lehman from 2001-2008.
Civil and criminal lawsuits against the accounting firm of Arthur Andersen over its part in the collapse of Enron led to Andersen's demise, but nothing so drastic is expected in this case, according to various financial publications, websites and blog posts.
Ernst & Young didn't return requests made by Crain's Monday or Tuesday for comment.
Jeff Bergeron, managing partner of the Detroit office, said Tuesday that he couldn't comment on the record on any possible impact to local operations and referred a reporter to New York.
Cuomo alleged that a series of bookkeeping moves, known as Repo 105 transactions, allowed Lehman to temporarily remove billions of dollars of highly liquid fixed-income securities from its books by selling them for brief periods to European banks and then buying them back.
The brief said that such moves amounted to "massive accounting fraud" that "defrauded the investing public."
Cuomo alleged that Ernst & Young knew that "at no time did Lehman disclose, either in its financial statements or otherwise, that it was transferring tens of billions of dollars in fixed-income securities to foreign banks on a temporary basis, often at the very end of Lehman's fiscal quarters, with the obligation to quickly repurchase the securities."
The brief alleged the transactions had no independent business purpose and that a number of Lehman's senior executives warned their superiors that the transactions were improper.
"E&Y directly facilitated a major accounting fraud and helped Lehman mislead the public as to its true financial condition," said Cuomo.
Lehman Bros. collapsed in September 2008.

description.content:
Tizenegy és fél perc. Sajnos nem csapatás, hanem nagyon is jólnevelt autózás, de akkor is megéri végignézni.
Mik ezek?
X
A sorban látható gombokkal a webes közösségi hálózatokon - iWiW, Facebook - fejezheted ki egy kattintással tetszésedet vagy
oszthatod meg a cikkel kapcsolatos véleményedet ismerőseiddel.
"Tetszik" / "Like" gomb. Ezzel a gombbal a Facebookon fejezheted ki tetszésedet a cikkel kapcsolatban - üzenőfaladon
egyszerűen csak annyi jelenik meg, hogy kedveled ezt a cikket. Ha most éppen be vagy jelentkezve a Facebookra, akkor azt is
látod, hogy ismerőseid közül valakinek tetszett-e már ez az írás. Ha nem vagy bejelentkezve, a gomb megnyomása után ezt
egyszerűen megteheted. (Ez a gomb tényleg csak egy szimpla tetszésnyilvánítás - ha a cikkel kapcsolatban egyből véleményt is
megosztanál, akkor használd a cikk alatti szürke hátterű sorban található "Facebook" feliratot.)
"Megosztás az iWiW-en" gomb. Ezzel a gombbal a legnépszerűbb magyar közösségi oldalon, az iWiW-en tudsz tartalmat
megosztani. A felugró ablakban beírhatod véleményedet is, és ha épp nem vagy bejelentkezve, egyben azt is megteheted.
Videón az új vadóc és a nagy öreg
Kezdjük rögtön a nehezével, az első néhány perc igencsak unalmas snitteket tartalmaz, amely alá a tévéműsorok szerkesztői nagyon bölcs dolgokat mondhatnak. De ez ne tántorítson el senkit sem, kicsivel később beindulnak az autók.
6:30-tól kezd izgalmassá válni, a nagy öreg, az E30 M3 valahol 8:50 magasságában kerül képbe istenigazából. Levezetésként 10:30-tól megint vágóképek következnek, megnézhetjük az Ascari versenypálya néhány részletét, illetve az égen köröző sast is. Úgyhogy tessék a 6:30-10:30 közötti részre koncentrálni.

Olvasóink fáradhatatlan aktivitásának köszönhetően az elmúlt évek során a megye meghatározó fórumává váltunk,
ahol cikkeink kapcsán értékes viták, párbeszédek alakultak ki. Ahogy e fórum résztvevőinek száma egyre növekedett,
sajnos a komoly hozzászólások közé egyre gyakrabban keveredtek céltalan, romboló beírások. Ezért éreztük úgy,
hogy eljött az ideje annak, hogy a kommentelés lehetőségét regisztrációhoz kössük, kiszűrve az értelmes fórumozást
zavaró tartalmakat. A regisztrációt ugyanakkor a korábbinál lényegesen egyszerűbbé tettük: elég csak nevet,
fehasználói nevet és emailt megadni. Reméljük olvasóink is úgy gondolják, hogy megéri megtenni ezt az egyszeri és
egyszerű lépést azért, hogy barátságosabb közegben, értelmesebb mederben folytatódhassék a párbeszéd.
(Ha problémája akad a regisztrációval vagy a hozzászólás új módjával, "hozzászólás" tárggyal írjon levelet a baon@baon.hu címre.)

Kitűnően tud takarékoskodni, jól bánik a pénzzel. Mindent elvállal, ami jövedelmet hoz, még azt is, amit más nem tud megcsinálni. Arra ügyeljen,...
Ámor megint szíven találta. Azonban a szerelemben igen zárkózott, nehezen nyílik meg. Az élet örömeit nem tudja felhőtlenül élvezni, mert...
Fantáziája szárnyaló. Sok mindenre kíváncsi, és ki is próbálja az útjába kerülő lehetőségeket. Szolgálatkész, a közös munkákból kiveszi a részét.
A mai napra nem sok jót ígérnek a csillagok. Türelemre és kitartásra van szüksége, terveit most nem igazán tudja megvalósítani. A gondok özöne...
Ma ne számítson arra, hogy könnyen eléri a célját, még akkor sem, ha nem ütközik leküzdhetetlen akadályokba. Ha pedig utazásra kényszerül, akkor...
Ha nem elég figyelmes, ma lemaradhat valamiről, amit később megbánhatna. Legyen tehát résen, és a kínálkozó lehetőségeket ne szalassza el...
Ma sokkal aktívabb, energikusabb, határozottabb, mint tegnap volt. Hisz az igazában és mindent megtesz, hogy ezt bebizonyítsa mások előtt....
Új szerelem a láthatáron! Közelebb, mint gondolta volna. A pillantásokból is láthatja, hogy csak a kezét kell kinyújtania.
Rengeteg megbeszélnivalója akadna társával, de szinte soha nincs rá ideje. Legyen most Ön az erősebb, szakítson időt a párbeszédre. Tisztázódnak a...
Képes az élet apró örömeit is élvezni, ami közérzetére és egészségére is kedvező hatást fejt ki. Csupa pozitív hatások érik a mai napon. Valaki...
Óriási eredményeket ért el, amit mások is elismernek, ezért büszke lehet magára. Kedvező helyzetét igyekezzen kihasználni munkahelyén! Este menjen...
Megjelenését igyekezzen a legjobb formába hozni. Ezek a dolgok nagyon sokat jelentenek. Ön is jól érzi magát, és mások is elismerik, vonzónak...

description.hltext_display: New Zealand facing big claims challenges
description.content:
September’s Canterbury earthquake in New Zealand has become the largest insurance claims event in the New Zealand Earthquake Commission’s (EQC) 65-year history.
Read more: [New Zealand Earthquake Commission]
September’s Canterbury earthquake in New Zealand has become the largest claims event in the New Zealand Earthquake Commission’s (EQC) 65-year history, according to a report from risk modelling firm Risk Management Solutions (RMS).
December 6 was the deadline for residential property owners to submit insurance claims to the EQC for damage sustained from the event. By the end of December 6, more than 160,000 policy claims to residential properties had been submitted, and the EQC continues the long process of settling the sizeable number of claims.
RMS initially estimated...

description.hltext_display: Pubblico impiego, l'attacco di Tondo: stipendi più alti d’Italia
description.content:
I sindacati protestano per la Finanziaria e confermano lo sciopero del 20 gennaio. Il presidente della Regione Renzo Tondo e l’assessore al Personale Andrea Garlatti spiegano che è arrivato il momento di dare uno stop alla «crescita esponenziale» del ”contrattone”
TRIESTE Renzo Tondo si appella alla responsabilità dei sindacati del pubblico impiego in tempi di crisi. Andrea Garlatti scolpisce i numeri, a partire dal tetto massimo, 19 milioni per il contratto a regime: oltre non si può andare. I sindacati protestano e confermano lo sciopero del 20 gennaio, tanto più dopo gli acconti infilati in Finanziaria «a scavalcare la contrattazione»? Il presidente della Regione e l’assessore al Personale si dicono disponibili a risedersi al tavolo di trattativa ma spiegano che è arrivato il momento di dare uno stop alla «crescita esponenziale» del ”contrattone”. Una partita che costa a ciascun cittadino del Friuli Venezia Giulia 560 euro.
I numeri li illustra Garlatti: al 31 dicembre 2008 servivano quasi 690 milioni per stipendiare i 16mila dipendenti di Regione, Province e Comuni. E ancora costi a regime esorbitanti (47,8 milioni di euro) per il biennio 2004-05; un costo medio unitario incrementato, dal 2000 al 2007, del 16,8% in Regione, del 36,8% nei comuni capoluogo, del 22,5% nelle Province, del 40,6% nei restanti comuni; una dinamica retributiva cresciuta in 12 anni, con 4 progressioni economiche, dal 74% della categoria A al 101% della D; maggiori compensi rispetto al resto d’Italia dal 7 al 23%, dai 116 euro mensili in più di un usciere ai 590 euro aggiuntivi di un funzionario.
Non basta. Garlatti, in un’«operazione chiarezza», ricorda che il dipendente pubblico del Friuli Venezia Giulia, sempre rispetto al collega italiano, ha il 40% in più di salario aggiuntivo (con le oltre mille posizioni organizzative, per circa 12 milioni, che pesano a parte), il 6% in più di ferie, il 12% in più di malattia e un mese in più di maternità al 100% dello stipendio. E allora, chiede Tondo, perché non accettare aumenti (da 55 a 75 euro medi mensili, Cgil, Uil, Ugl e Cisal ne chiedono da 62 a 86) pari al 3,16% della massa salariale 2007 (602.159.002 euro), con differenze medie mensili lorde da 6,5 a 13 euro? E perché non gradire l’a utorizzazione del Consiglio ai datori di lavoro a erogare acconti sino al 90%? «I sindacati si sono divisi da soli, non ci abbiamo certo pensato noi - ribadisce Tondo -, e nemmeno intendiamo correre il rischio di rotture sociali tra lavoratori pubblici e privati. L’a ppello è a spegnere polemiche che non servono a nessuno, cogliere l’

description.hltext_display: La Catedral, «Museu del Poble»
description.content:
Un ajut RecerCaixa permet al Grup de Recerca en Història de l´Art Modern de la UdG estudiar l'abast de la destrucció
VOTI AQUESTA NOTÍCIA
Un ajut recercaixa permet a un equip d´historiadors de l´art de la udg i la uab estudiar l´abast de la destrucció i salvaguarda del patrimoni artístic català arxiu mas de barcelona
DANIEL BONAVENTURA Un equip de recerca d'història de l'art de la Universitat de Girona i de la Universitat Autònoma de Barcelona està localitzant nombrosos documents inèdits sobre la destrucció i salvaguarda del patromoni, com són dues fotografies completament inèdites que documenten el procés de transformació de la Catedral de Girona en Museu del Poble durant el període de guerra i revolució del 1936 al 1939, les quals difonem avui per primera vegada, una de les quals a portada, la segona aquí.
La primera de les fotografies mostra els treballs inicials per desmuntar el rerecor medieval i l'orgue del segle XIX de la seu gironina, mentre la segona presenta la nau ja pràcticament buida, a punt per ser equipada com a museu.
Aquest va ser un projecte de la Generalitat de Catalunya, que va decomissar la Catedral de Girona a les autoritats eclesiàstiques en una mesura orientada a salvar el seu ric patrimoni de la crema d'esglésies del 1936. Els fets històrics es van precipitar. La Catedral va tornar a mans de l'Església i a partir de l'any 1940 es va començar a construir un orgue nou. Del vell no se'n va saber res més, mentre que algunes de les cadires del cor medieval han estat localitzades a la Garriga (Vallès Oriental) i a Canet de Mar (Maresme).
Aquesta és només una mostra del treball que està portant a terme un equip integrat pels professors Joan Bosch, Joaquim Garriga i Francesc Miralpeix (UdG), i Bonaventura Bassegoda, Marià Carbonell, Núria Llorens, Anna Muntada i Maria Garganté (UAB). El seu projecte Art en perill: Cens i Memòria de la Destrucció, dirigit per Marià Carbonell, figura entre els grup selecte d'escollits en la convocatòria d'ajudes RecerCaixa 2010, a la qual van concórrer un total de 461 projectes i només 20 van resultar seleccionats.
En el cas que ens ocupa, això ha suposat rebre un ajut de 67.909 euros per desenvolupar durant dos anys una acció de recerca i divulgació sobre aspectes de la destrucció i salvaguarda del patrimoni artístic català als segles XIX i XX, durant l'ocupació napoleònica, la desamortització, la Setmana Tràgica o la Guerra Civil.
Francesc Miralpeix ha explicat que el Grup de recerca en història de l'art modern de la UdG i de la UAB és un equip que treballa des de fa 10 anys com a "grup consolidat", amb una experiència de llarg recorregut en l'estudi dels processos de destrucció del patrimoni, cosa que permet conèixer l'abast de la destrucció, així com elaborar un inventari de les obres destruïdes, i també de les salvades.
Miralpeix ha fet notar que, llastimosament, bona part del patrimoni antic català només el podem "imaginar" a partir de les fotos en blanc i negre que en diversos arxius s'han conservat, mentre que si passem al Rosselló o a Andorra, on la destrucció per la guerra no es va produir, fins i tot les petites esglesioles conserven en gran part la seva decoració històrica.

description.hltext_display: 哈市经适房货币补贴每户获4万 可任意购买商品房
description.content:
今日，哈尔滨市2010年经济适用住房货币补贴举行摇号仪式，此次摇号将有1000户家庭获得4万元购房货币补贴资格，待买完房后，到所在街道办事处登记，以此作为凭证，获得4万元的现金补贴。据悉，获得补贴的住户购买的房子是不得出售的，否则政府要将4万元补贴款收回。 当日9时，摇号仪式开始，之前还人声鼎沸的会场一下子安静下来，前来摇号的市民都目不转睛地盯着会场上的大屏幕，生怕一不小心看漏了自己的名字。在第二轮摇号刚结束时，会场内一位神情激动的女士引起了记者的注意。据介绍，这位女士叫王丽娟，因为刚刚摇到补贴资格，所以异常兴奋，王丽娟说，目前她和女儿两个人住在18平方米的房子里，眼看着孩子越来越大，她希望能够给孩子一个独立的空间。王丽娟高兴地说：“之前已经去看过好多二手房了，就盼望着这次能摇到号，加上自己的存款，我就能换一个大点的房子了。这次能摇中真是中大奖了，太幸福了。”
据了解，自2006年哈市实行经济适用住房货币补贴以来，截至目前，已有6732户家庭领到了经适房货币补贴，补贴金额达2.2亿元，本次摇号又让1000户居民受益。据悉，获得补贴资格的居民可在全市范围内，购买新建商品房或二手房，然后持新建住房的合同和发票，购买二手房的携带买卖双方的合同、更名的证据，到所在街道办事处，进行登记，以此作为凭证，通过区里，即可获得4万元补贴。但是，购买的房子是不得出售的，如果出售，政府要将4万元收回。此外，如果获得补贴资格的居民在一年内没有购买房子，4万元补贴资金资格将被作废，但仍有继续申请经适房补贴摇号的权利。(记者 孙殿喜)

description.hltext_display: Zanetti Bros. reaches deal with United States Department of Justice
description.content:
OSBURN - After two-and-a-half years of litigation, six figures and many sleepless nights, the second and third generation owners of Zanetti Bros. Inc. announced Tuesday they reached a settlement with the United Sates Department of Justice.
In 1997 Zanetti Bros. received notice that the United States Environmental Protection Agency intended to add the company to a suit filed by the United States against major mining companies for past mining activities seeking $1 billion in cleanup costs.
The EPA claimed Zanetti Bros. was also liable for mining and milling work done by four Zanetti Brothers that operated a family partnership working from the early 1930s through the late 1940s.
The EPA sued in 2008, seeking damages for the cleanup cost of the Coeur d'Alene Basin.
Zanetti Bros. disputed the claim.
"With the enactment by Congress of Comprehensive Environmental Response, Compensation and Liability Act in December of 1980, our nation's environmental laws changed, thus putting/making many companies like the Zanetti Family Partnership - which started back in the early 1930s with four brothers, a couple of mules and a mine car - liable for paying a portion of the EPA's cleanup of the basin," the release said.
Terms of the settlement were not available, but according to the release, "the mining companies' loyalties to the Zanetti Family and Zanetti Bros., Inc. have allowed us to stay in business in the Silver Valley for many years."
The company could not have survived, otherwise, officials said.
"Had it not been for their support, we and many other businesses would not have been able to continue operations," the release said. "We have all endured the never-ending stigma of having the largest and most expensive Superfund site in the nation hanging over our heads."
More about Zanetti

description.hltext_display: It all adds up
description.content:
COEUR d'ALENE - In 2006 Brian Tenney moved back to Coeur d'Alene and began doing tax returns for family and a few friends.
In July of 2009, Tenney was out of town at a training class when two different business clients called him on his cell phone in a panic.
Their outside bookkeepers had caused some problems with the IRS, and then quit responding to their voicemails and e-mails. They both asked Tenney to take over the payroll and bookkeeping for their businesses, and get them "straightened out."
He did, and so launched his business, "CORE Accounting and Consulting," from primarily tax return preparation into a full-service accounting firm. It turned out to be a great move for both Tenney and his clients. His customer base has grown in leaps and bounds each year since and there's no end in sight.
Tenney graduated from the University of Idaho in 1998 with a degree in accounting. He started his career by working for the Spokane office of Price Waterhouse Coopers, the largest accounting firm in the world, where he primarily worked on audits of large publicly traded companies.
In 2000, he moved back to Moscow to work for a regional firm, Presnell Gage Accounting & Consulting. There he specialized in small business accounting, tax and consulting. In 2006 he moved to Coeur d'Alene and worked as assistant controller of Great Floors, a locally owned retail chain.
That was when he started his own CPA practice as a side business, which has since grown into a full-time endeavor with four part-time employees.
Tenney said that starting a business from scratch is not for the faint of heart. It's a multi-year investment of time, effort and money, and you most likely will not reap the rewards for several years.
Keeping your eye on the long-term goal will help you overcome the day-to-day frustrations and disappointments.
Working alone, Tenney had kept everything he needed to remember in his head. Unfortunately, employees aren't great mind-readers, which makes communication and training very important.
"Unfortunately, we accountants too often focus on the numbers and not enough on the people we are serving," he said. "I've worked hard to overcome that in my business. I have a great relationship with all my clients."
Tenney attended classes at the Idaho Small Business Development Center looking for guidance on his business strategy, growth strategy, and to learn how to run a business more effectively. He learned how to identify which types of services he should focus his attention on developing and growing the most aggressively.
CORE Accounting and Consulting is at 105 S. Sixth St., Coeur d'Alene, 83814, (208) 676-8900, www.corecpa.net.
More about Business

More about Accounting

description.hltext_display: 国家发改委就成品油价格调整问题答记者问
description.content:
近日，国家发展改革委发出通知，决定自12月22日零时起将汽、柴油价格每吨分别提高310元和300元，测算到零售价格90号汽油和0号柴油（全国平均）每升分别提高0.23元和0.26元。就此，记者采访了国家发展改革委有关负责同志。
问：这次成品油价格调整的背景是什么？
答：这次成品油价格仍然是根据现行价格机制进行调整的。10月26日国内成品油价格调整以来，国际市场油价持续震荡上扬。特别是进入12月以后，受主要经济体经济回升以及寒冷天气带动取暖油需求增长等因素影响，国际市场油价大幅走高。12月20日，美国西德克萨斯原油（WTI）和英国北海布伦特原油期货价格分别涨至每桶88.81美元和92.74美元，达到2008年10月初以来的最高水平。截止目前国际市场原油连续22个工作日移动平均价格已超过4%，按现行成品油价格机制，应适当上调国内成品油价格。
但是，综合考虑当前物价形势以及成品油市场供应状况，国家适当推迟了提价时间、控制了提价幅度。
问：在当前国内价格总水平上涨压力较大的情况下，国家坚持按成品油价格机制理顺成品油价格主要基于什么考虑？
答：7月份以来，受国内外多种因素影响，国内价格总水平上涨较快。对此，党中央、国务院高度重视，要求各地区、各部门积极采取措施，稳定消费价格总水平，保障群众基本生活。在这种情况下，国家仍然坚持按现行价格机制提高国内成品油价格是经过慎重考虑的，是从国民经济全局和长远发展角度作出的选择，目的是坚持资源性产品价格形成机制改革的方向，调动企业生产和进口积极性，保障国内市场供应，同时抑制不合理消费，促进节能减排和经济结构调整。
2009年我国石油对外依存度达到53%。2010年国内石油消费继续快速增长，1-10月份国内成品油表观消费量累计达到1.9亿吨左右，同比增长10.6%；进口原油1.98亿吨，同比增长20%。预计今年石油对外依存度将接近55%，石油安全面临的形势更加严峻。充分发挥价格杠杆的调节和引导作用，抑制石油消费过快增长，促进经济发展方式转变和资源节约是现实、必然的选择。及时理顺国内成品油价格，有利于充分利用国际国内两个市场、两种资源，满足国内日益增长的石油需求。理顺成品油价格，短期内会对下游用油行业产生一定影响，但长远有利于保持国民经济的健康可持续发展。
问：油价调整后，政府将采取哪些措施缓解对下游行业和困难群体的影响？
答：2006年3月实施石油价格综合配套改革时，国家建立了对种粮农民等部分困难群体和公益性行业补贴等四个配套机制，其目的就是为了缓解成品油价格调整对下游行业和困难群体的影响。
这次成品油调价后，国家将按照既定的补贴政策，继续对种粮农民、渔业（含远洋渔业）、林业、城市公交、农村道路客运（含岛际和农村水路客运）给予补贴，对出租车行业给予临时补贴。考虑到近年来柴油提价对种粮成本影响，明年中央财政将进一步提高对种粮农民农资综合补贴水平，切实保护种粮农民利益。各地将综合考虑成品油、液化气等价格调整和其他居民生活必需品价格上涨等因素，继续做好城乡低保对象等困难群体基本生活保障工作。
同时，为控制调价连锁反应，这次成品油调价后，城市公交、农村道路客运（含岛际和农村水路客运）、铁路客货运价格、民航燃油附加标准均不提高。成品油价格调整对出租车行业的影响，将综合采取增加补贴、适当调整出租车运价或收取燃油附加的方式进行疏导。从严控制公路客运价格调整，各地可以按油运价格联动机制要求，在企业消化一部分成品油调价影响的基础上，适当疏导成本增支因素。
问：这次成品油价格调整是否会推升价格总水平？
答：11月19日国务院下发《关于稳定消费价格总水平保障群众基本生活的通知》（国发[2010]40号）后，各地区、各部门从发展生产、保障供应、安定民生、加强监管等多个方面综合施策、重点治理，政策效果已初步显现。成品油是重要的生产和生活资料，价格调整主要是会对社会预期产生一定影响，对价格总水平直接影响十分有限。据匡算，这次成品油价格调整直接影响当月居民消费价格总水平（CPI）环比上升约0.07个百分点。为减缓调价影响，我们已经做了相应部署，在继续落实好国务院所确定的各项措施的同时，严格控制调价的连锁反应，并做好相关群体和行业的补贴工作。
问：成品油价格调整后，政府将采取哪些措施来保障市场供应，维护市场价格秩序？
答：有关部门明确要求中石油、中石化两公司做好成品油生产和调运的衔接，优化产品结构，加强综合协调和应急调度，保障成品油特别是柴油市场供应。并要求所有成品油生产经营企业严格执行国家价格政策，不得超价销售。同时，各级价格主管部门将加大市场监督检查力度，严厉查处不执行国家规定价格政策，以及囤积居奇、造谣惑众、合谋涨价、搭车涨价等违法行为，维护正常的市场秩序。

description.hltext_display: Sports Briefs December 21, 2010
description.content:
Ralph Friedgen was fired as Maryland's football coach Monday, effective after the Military Bowl on Dec. 29.
Friedgen received $2 million to cover the final year of his contract in 2011. Athletic director Kevin Anderson intended to immediately form a search committee to find Friedgen's replacement, and acknowledged that former Texas Tech coach Mike Leach is on his preliminary list.
During his 10 years at his alma mater, Friedgen went 74-50.
• Former NFL quarterback Ryan Leaf is planning to will write three books about his life, football career and addiction to painkillers.
The first book will focus on Leaf's career at Washington State, including the team's 1998 Rose Bowl appearance. Another book will be a broader biography covering his youth in Montana and troubled NFL career. A third book will be about his addiction to prescription painkillers, which resulted in a 2009 indictment while he was coaching quarterbacks at West Texas A&M.
In April, Leaf pleaded guilty to eight felony drug charges and received 10 years of probation.
Baseball
A person familiar with the deal said reliever Luis Vizcaino agreed to a minor league contract with the New York Yankees.
• Outfielder Rick Ankiel and the Washington Nationals agreed to a $1.5 million, one-year contract.
Mavericks 98, Heat 96: Dirk Nowitzki scored 26 points and visiting Dallas ended Miami's 12-game winning streak.
Dwyane Wade scored 22 points, while LeBron James and Chris Bosh each scored 19 for Miami.
Hawks 91, Magic 81: Al Horford scored 24 points and host Atlanta beat Orlando.
Jazz 101, Cavaliers 90: CJ Miles scored 22 points and visiting Utah beat Cleveland.
Pacers 94, Hornets 93: At Indianapolis, Mike Dunleavy's tip-in at the buzzer gave Indiana a win over New Orleans.
Spurs 118, Suns 110: Tim Duncan had 20 points and 15 rebounds, and host San Antonio beat undermanned Phoenix for its ninth win in a row.
Wizards 108, Bobcats 75: Nick Young scored 21 points in host Washington's win over Charlotte.
Trail Blazers 106, Bucks 80: LaMarcus Aldridge had 29 points and a career-high 19 rebounds, and host Portland beat Milwaukee.
Rockets 121, Warriors 112: At Oakland, Calif., Kevin Martin scored 30 points to lead Houston past Golden State.
Clippers 113, Timberwolves 90: Michael Beasley score 20 points and host Los Angeles beat Minnesota.
Penguins 6, Coyotes 1: Evgeni Malkin tied a career high with five points and host Pittsburgh beat Phoenix.
Panthers 5, Flyers 0: Tomas Vokoun earned his fourth shutout of the season to lead visiting Florida past Philadelphia.
Thrashers 6, Maple Leafs 3: Tobias Enstrom had two goals and two assists and visiting Atlanta beat Toronto.
Ducks 3, Bruins 0: Jonas Hiller stopped 45 shots to lead visiting Anaheim over Boston.
Lightning 5, Hurricanes 1: Steven Stamkos scored his 26th goal, leading host Tampa Bay past Carolina.
Canucks 3, Blues 1: Aaron Volpatti scored his first career goal as visiting Vancouver beat St. Louis.
Wild 4, Flames 1: At St. Paul, Minn., Martin Havlat had a goal and an assist to help Minnesota defeat Calgary.
- The Associated Press

description.hltext_display: 太原调整用地性质、容积率要征求利害关系人意见
description.content:
今后，想要调整建设用地性质、容积率，将有章可循。今天，太原市政府建设用地性质和容积率调整规划管理规定出台，符合相关条件才可以申请调整。调整过程中，按照程序还要征求利害关系人意见，必要时将组织听证。同一建设用地调整获批后，不得再次申请调整。 今后，因建设变化条件，确需调整规划用地性质和容积率指标的，按照规定必须符合下列条件之一：1、因城市总体规划、控制性详细规划和专项规划发生变更，地块开发条件发生变化的；2、因城市基础设施、公益性公共服务设施或重大项目建设需要，地块建设条件发生变化的；3、因国家、省、市有关政策发生变化的；4、经评估确需修改规划的；5、按城乡规划有关规定应当修改的其他情形。
想要调整用地性质或容积率，建设单位或个人应先向市城乡规划主管部门提出书面申请和可行性研究调整方案。经初审同意调整的，规划部门会组织专家论证。为保障公平，专家名单将会从专家库中随机抽取。经专家论证同意后，规划部门将通过政府网、规划网、在建设项目现场，向社会公示同意后的方案，征求利害关系人意见。公示时间将不少于15个工作日，公示期间若意见分歧较大，必要时将组织听证。随后，规划主管部门会将专家论证意见、公示及听证情况上报市政府审定。市政府批准后，规划部门将在5个工作日内为申请人核发规划用地性质或容积率指标《规划条件变更通知书》，同时将该通知书抄告市国土部门备案。规划用地性质和容积率调整未获市政府批准，或市城乡规划主管部门认定不予调整的，规划部门将书面答复并说明理由。
按照市府统一规定，容积率指标调整幅度必须在控制性详细规划确定的街区总容量不变的情况下进行，调整幅度要控制在20%以内，并满足建筑用地周围的技术控制要求。申请获批后，不得再次申请调整。建设单位或个人有违法建设行为的，其行为未得到处理前，不得申请调整。政府职能部门工作人员在调整规划用地性质或容积率指标工作中，失职渎职、滥用职权、徇私舞弊的，将由其主管部门或行政监察机关依法依纪追究责任，构成犯罪的，将依法追究刑事责任。 (记者 要维维）

description.hltext_display: Six returning JICA volunteers call on Minister of Finance
description.content:
Accra, Dec. 21, GNA - Mr Alex Kwaning, Deputy Director at the Ministry of Finance and Economic Planning, has lauded the immense contribution of Japanese Volunteers to rural development in the country.
He said "I wish to express our sincere gratitude to you all for volunteering to serve Ghana, especially in rural areas where basic amenities may not be as sophisticated as those you are used to in Japan."
"I am sure that within the two years of your service, you encountered some challenges but you weathered all storms and completed your activities. Ghana is grateful for your contributions and I believe that we will live to see the positive effect of your contribution on a large scale."
Mr Kwaning made the commendation when receiving a delegation of six returning Japanese volunteers who have completed various volunteering projects in Central, Eastern, Greater Accra and Upper West Regions.r
A statement issued in Accra by Mr Kojo Olabode-Williams, JICA Public Relations Advisor, said the delegation was part of the over 1,000 skilled, young and elderly volunteers of the Japan Overseas Cooperation Agency, JOCV.
It said they were constantly deplored to Ghana since 1977 to serve in education, health, tourism and private sector development, vocational training, engineering, agriculture and construction.
Each volunteer serves an average of two years in Ghana.
Mr Kwaning urged the volunteers to be ambassadors of Ghana and look for areas in the economy to invest.
"You have experienced the peace and hospitability in Ghana, inform your friends about Ghana and encourage them to invest in our growing economy. This will further strengthen the relationship that exists between both countries," he added.
The volunteers said Ghana remained a hospitable country with lots of growth potentials.
They expressed gratitude to all who contributed to the success of their activities, including locals, who supported project implementation at various stages.
Some of the projects they implemented included judo training, community health, nutrition, effective breastfeeding, HIV/AIDS confidential counselling and testing, eradication of stigmatisation and discrimination against people living with HIV, tourism promotion, improvement of access to water and community sanitation.
The volunteers are Ms Satoko Aichi, (Nursing Officer) Ms Mio Shirai, (HIV/AIDS Controller) Ms Yuko Tanaka, (HIV/AIDS Controller) Mr Hiroyuki Suzuki, (Community Development Officer, Tourism) Ms Mariyo Nishikawa (Community Development Officer, Water and Sanitation) and Mr Yukimitsu Eguchi (Judo Instructor, Ghana Police Service and Ghana Judo Association).
They served the Ministry of Health, Ghana Health Service, Ministry of Local Government and Rural Development, Ministry of Education and the Ghana Police Service.
Areas where they worked included Awutu-Efutu District Assembly (Winneba), Kwaebibrem District Assembly (Kade), Brim North District Health Service (New Abirem), Lawra District Assembly (Lawra) and Donkokrom (Presbyterian University College).
Mr Kazuhiko Higuchi, new Coordinator for the Tamale Office of the JOCV was introduced to the Ministry. He oversees the activities of Japanese volunteers in the northern part of the country.
On February 17, 1977, the Governments of Ghana and Japan signed an Exchange of Notes that paved way for the establishment of JOCV in Ghana.

description.hltext_display: Rangers & Celtic hit back at Aberdeen chief Willie Miller's accusations of poaching young players
description.content:
By Craig Swan THE Old Firm last night hit back at Aberdeen hero Willie Miller as a war of words erupted between the clubs.
Celtic youth chief Chris McCart furiously defended his club in the wake of accusations from the Dons' director of football while Rangers' Academy boss Jimmy Sinclair also waded in.
Miller lit the touchpaper when he accused Celtic and Rangers of trying to tap up and poach Aberdeen's stars of the future.
The Pittodrie club plough �500,000 each year into their youth development programme and Miller insisted the investment has paid off.
But Miller also told Dons shareholders it is a continual struggle to fend off the Glaswegian predators.
Miller, who has seen the emergence of Chris Maguire, Peter Pawlett, Fraser Fyvie, Ryan Jack and Clark Robertson since taking over his role six years ago, said: "This is the best crop of young players in Scotland.
"That has taken a lot of work from everyone involved to make sure we keep these young players.
"Believe me, it is a tough environment for these kids at 14. Rangers and Celtic are constantly at our games, trying to tap up our players and steal them away.
"We have top players at under-16 level and everyone in British football, not just in Scotland, is chasing them.
"We have to work hard with the boys and thei r parents to get them to believe when I tell them not to go to Rangers and Celtic, but to come to Aberdeen.
"Here they can see a pathway to the first team but I have to make them realise if you go to these other clubs you won't get a chance.
"The reason I do it is to make sure there is a future for the club with the young players we have developed."
McCart - head of youth at Parkhead - said: "This is absolute nonsense and we are very disappointed at these accusations .
"Celtic conducts itself with absolute integrity in terms of the recruitment of players.
"We are not aware of any issues whatsoever with Aberdeen FC and do not understand why these comments have been made."
Sinclair said: "Any dealings we have had with Aberdeen regarding the recruitment of young players has been in accordance with SPL and SFA regulations.
"We would give Willie the benefit of the doubt in his language used to shareholders as I think he would be the first to acknowledge that he would be unable to substantiate any irregularity on the part of Rangers."

description.hltext_display: Motherwell star Steve Jennings facing indefinite ban while probe into suspect betting continues
description.content:
By Keith Jackson S
STEVE JENNINGS is facing the nightmare scenario of being banned indefinitely from all football after the SFA launched its own probe into his controversial red card.
Record Sport can reveal that explosive new evidence - which was handed to the SPL by a leading bookmaker - has now been passed to SFA chief executive Stewart Regan.
And the powers that be are so concerned by the content of this smoking gun they have al ready begun privately discussing the possibility of suspending Jennings for as long as it takes to establish the facts.
Jennings has been at the centre of a scandal since bookies first announced they were to investigate suspicious betting patterns surrounding Motherwell's live TV clash with Hearts last Tuesday.
On the day of the match one individual based in the Liverpool area opened a new account with Blue Square to place two �100 bets on a Well player being red-carded.
The same person then attempted to make further big money punts, only to be barred from doing so by the firm's online security filter.
Bosses at Blue Square recently passed new information to the SPL to explain why they believe the investigation must be stepped up to the next level. And these details are now being probed by Regan and the SFA .
Record Sport understands SPL chief execut ive Nei l Doncaster has seen enough to be worried about the possible damage done to the league should Jennings play again without first having his name cleared.
The player - who has been hit with a three-game ban - could return to action after Well take on Hamilton on January 1, leaving Regan little more than a week to decide what steps, if any, to take.
The case is being described as extremely sensitive but if it is decided Jennings should not be allowed to play on while the investigation is ongoing, Regan will have two options.
The SFA could suspend the player's registration - a move that would blackball him from football - or they could put pressure on his club to put the Scouser on gardening leave pending the completion of their investigation.
A Hampden source said: "There is information floating around which would make you feel there is more to this case than meets the eye. There is even the possibility of police involvement.
"The SPL would rather any player in this position be suspended pending the outcome of an investigation, rather than be allowed to continue to operate in the league. But that decision will have to be made by the SFA .
"The guy is innocent until proven guilty but at the same time there is an obligation to make sure the integrity of the game is not compromised."

description.hltext_display: 公安交通管理部门启动应急预案应对恶劣天气
description.content:
http://www.qianlong.com/2010-12-22 06:29:24千龙网
新华网北京12月21日电（记者周英峰 邹伟）记者21日从公安部交管局获悉，针对即将到来的恶劣天气，公安部交管局要求各地公安交管部门启动应急预案，加强协作配合，加强巡逻管控，加强宣传提示，全力确保主干高速公路和国省道安全畅通。
据中央气象台预报，21日夜间起，中国大部分地区降温6℃―10℃。未来3天，内蒙古、黑龙江、新疆等地局部地区有大到暴雪。辽宁、河北、安徽、湖北、湖南、江西、浙江、福建、重庆、四川、云南等省有能见度不足1000米的雾，局部地区能见度不足200米。
为确保强降温、降雪和大雾恶劣天气期间的道路安全畅通，各地公安交管部门正按照统一部署启动相应级别应急预案。内蒙古、黑龙江、新疆等地启动高速公路雪天交通应急三级预案，河北、辽宁、浙江、安徽、福建、江西、湖北、湖南、重庆、四川、云南等地启动高速公路、城市快速路、国省道主干线雾天和交通事故快速处理交通应急预案。京港澳、京藏、沪昆、沈海高速公路和107国道沿线各公安交管部门做好勤务部署和安排，迅速进入应急启动状态。

description.hltext_display: The Front row with Tim Dahlberg December 21, 2010
description.content:
Lee says $120 million was enough
Font Size:
To hear some people in baseball talk, they may have to hold a benefit to make sure Cliff Lee has enough left in his bank account for retirement.
Social Security only goes so far, you know, and now that Lee has left $30 million on the table to join the Philadelphia Phillies there surely has to be some concern about his financial future.
All right, so there isn't. Lee would have to spend money like Mike Tyson in his heyday to burn through the $120 million the Phillies will pay him over the next five years.
Still, the buzz seemed more about what he turned down from the New York Yankees than the contract with the Phillies that guarantees he will be incredibly rich for a long time to come.
"That's the most I've ever seen a player walk away from," former Mets general manager Omar Minaya said. "It's unprecedented."
The talk may be louder because the guy who just left the Phillies grabbed every dollar he could to join a losing team. Argue Jayson Werth's talents all you want, but there's no way he is worth $126 million, regardless of how ludicrous baseball contracts have gotten.
And ludicrous they are. The numbers are so staggering we might as well be talking about Monopoly money as the real thing.
And now Lee is being held up by some as a shining example of someone not motivated by greed. This, after signing his name to the bottom of a contract that will pay him an average of $24 million a year.
To throw a baseball. Ludicrous doesn't even begin to describe it.
Lee was in Philadelphia on Wednesday explaining what he plans to do for the Phillies for that kind of money. He wasn't specific, but here's hoping that Phillies fans get more than the 12 wins he managed to scratch together for two teams last year.
I was on the phone to the Save the Children charity in Connecticut, wondering what that kind of money could do for them. It is the giving season, of course, and 10,200 people have contributed to their current Gifts of Joy campaign.
They gave an average of $52, which doesn't sound like much in the Cliff Lee universe. But when $40 buys malaria tents for four and $50 pays for basic tools for health care workers in impoverished countries, it can go a long way.
"For $120 you can bring a community a bicycle," said Kathleen Loehr, vice president of resource development for Save the Children. "That's their ambulance, how they transport sick children from remote villages to health clinics."
So what could Cliff Lee's money do? Well, let's count the ways.
For what Lee will make to pitch one game, the charity - which is active in 120 countries - could help save the lives of 10,000 malnourished children by providing them with specially formulated peanut paste for eight weeks so they gain weight and get stronger.
But I'm also not going to nominate him for the Nobel Peace Prize for leaving behind a pile of money (much less than $30 million, actually, after agent fees and taxes). His salary is still so far out of whack with that of paying fans, even Lee had to acknowledge that much.
"It's plenty of money," he said. "When you hit a certain point, enough is enough."
On that, at least, we can agree.
Tim Dahlberg is a national sports columnist for The Associated Press. Write to him at tdahlberg(at)ap.org

description.hltext_display: 太原规范房地产市场秩序 13部门各把关口
description.content:
太原房市如何能在一个良性平台上健康发展？继国务院、省政府一系列“促进房地产市场平稳健康发展”措施实施后，12月21日，太原市政府“因地制宜”，出台了《关于进一步规范房地产市场秩序的实施意见》(简称《意见》)。发改委、规划、国土等13个部门被明确职责分工，合力规范省城房地产市场发展。 今后，各县(市、区)政府行政一把手，将是规范房地产市场秩序第一责任人。遏制房地产违法开发销售，市府将建立联合执法机制。确认违法开发销售的，相关部门将不得为违法开发销售建设项目办理后续手续。与此同时，太原还将通过建立房地产市场诚信机制、信用档案体系，对行业进行有效监管。
1 严禁以集资建房名义搞鬼
从“源头”下手，治理房地产开发市场。发改委是各类建房项目的审核部门。《意见》第一条就要求发改委严格审核各类建房项目，严禁以集资建房名义变相搞商品房开发销售。
针对国有企业在改制、集资建房等过程中，有可能出现的违反规定擅自改变土地用途，违法联建、变相搞商品房开发销售的现象，市府也明确监管部门，要求市国资委严格监管，防止市属国有企业发生这些违法行为。
2 严查借城中村改造开发商品房
今后，借城中村改造名义违法进行商品房开发销售，将由太原市住建委负责查处。市府要求住建委尽快出台相关政策，依法严厉查处参与违法用地、违法销售、违法建设行为。商品住房工程质量分户验收制度，也将由住建委牵头在全市推行。市府还将通过健全商品住房交付使用管理规定，落实预售商品住房质量责任，以使商品房购买者买得更放心。
涉嫌房地产类非法集资、高利贷、一房多卖、诈骗等犯罪案件的侦办，将由市公安局负责。同时，公安部门还将配合有关部门查处房地产市场违法行为。
3 证件不齐全停工并处罚
今后，未取得《建筑工程施工许可证》或未按照《建筑工程施工许可证》要求进行建设的工程，将由市城乡管委会负责停止施工，并依法处罚。未取得《建设工程规划许可证》或未按照《建设工程许可证》违规建设、违规变更规划调整容积率等违规行为，将由市城乡规划局牵头查处。
市工商局将依法查处房地产开发企业发布违法违规广告，和超出核准登记经营范围从事经营活动行为。与此同时，市财政局将严格土地出让价款收缴管理。
4 所有在建房将集中清理整顿
即日起，由市房产管理局牵头，对所有在建商品住房项目进行一次清理整治。届时，将会对已取得预售许可的商品住房项目逐一排查，跟踪管理，防止开发商捂盘惜售、超范围预售。与此同时，还将开展商品房预(销)售专项整顿，重点查处商品房预(销)售和房地产中介违法违规行为。建立商品住房市场动态监管制度，稳定市场预期。
市物价部门将集中对在售商品房明码标价制度进行查处，依法查处房地产开发、销售、中介服务中的价格欺诈、哄抬房价以及违反明码标价规定等价格违法行为。
5 不符合政策规定的严禁放贷
《意见》还要求中国人民银行太原中心支行加强房地产信贷风险管理，严格执行房地产项目资本金要求，严禁对不符合信贷政策规定的房地产开发企业或开发项目发放房地产贷款，严格落实差别化贷款政策，强化商业银行商品房预售款监管。
市国税局、市地税局将负责对房地产开发企业偷税漏税行为进行查处。市府要求税务部门严格执行国家有关个人销售、购买普通住房与非普通住房、首次购房与非首次购房差别化税收政策，发挥国家住房税收政策对房地产市场的调控作用。
6 企业违规行为将被记入诚信档案
今后，太原市还将通过建立房地产市场诚信机制和信用档案体系，加强对房地产开发企业、房地产经济机构诚信行为的监管。对发现的违法违规行为及时查处后，还将记入企业诚信档案。对在建房地产项目，将重点检查被投诉举报企业、项目，实行“一案一册”，查处一批，曝光一批，记录在档，作为年度考核企业资质依据。对违法违规企业相关负责人实行责任追究，对造成重大工程质量事故的房地产开发企业法定代表人、负责人，依法追究相应责任。
市政府明确要求土地、规划、建设、房管等部门，要掌握房地产市场发展动态，及时准确向社会公开各建设项目证件办理信息，建立并公布电子信箱、投诉电话，完善群众来信来访接待，畅通消费者举报投诉渠道，及时查处举报投诉的房地产市场违法违规行为。 (记者 要维维)

description.hltext_display: SPL: Celtic 1 Kilmarnock 1
description.content:
By David McCarthy
CELTIC drew their third home match in a row and left Parkhead to a chorus of jeers yet again.
But it was Kilmarnock who left Glasgow's East End wondering what might have been after coming within five minutes of busting a 55-year jinx.
Conor Sammon's sensational solo effort nine minutes after the break looked to have given Mixu Paatelainen's men an incredible victory after they'd survived a first-half mauling.
Thomas Rogne's 85th-minute header snatched a point for Celtic but it was scant consolation on a night when victory would have taken them above Rangers. Now they trail by two points having played a game more.
And they lost top scorer Gary Hooper to what is a serious ankle injury. This was not a good night for Neil Lennon, whose team have won just three of their last eight matches, but it was almost a great one for Paatelainen.
In a season blighted by barminess we had a match taking place four days before Christmas in temperatures of minus 10 degrees. The same match was postponed on a day the mercury had climbed to a balmy six degrees and the surrounding areas were more treacherous last night.
Then again, there weren't many folk slipping along London Road last night. Vast swathes of empty green seats greeted the players as they stepped on to the pitch through a layer of freezing fog. It was colder than an eskimo's nose.
Celtic hadn't played since the home draw against Dundee United on November 27 and there was an eagerness about their work.
Kilmarnock, for all their fine form of late, began tentatively and could have been two down in 11 minutes but escaped punishment for two glaring errors.
Four minutes in, James Fowler inexplicably passed straight to Niall McGinn inside his own box but Cammy Bell saved the tame effort.
McGinn was then given another gift, from Frazer Wright this time, when the centre-back seemed to have cleared the danger before miscuing into the winger's path and he cut inside to blaze a shot over when he should have done better.
Paatelainen's men would have been thankful the chances hadn't fallen to Hooper. The Englishman showed his predatory instincts in between the two gifts by slotting away a chance only to be denied by a justified offside flag.
Willie Collum, at Parkhead for the first time since he infuriated Celtic at the last Old Firm game, had a quiet start but booked Fowler in the 17th minute for a rash challenge on Joe Ledley.
Two minutes later McGinn should have been celebrating his hat-trick but was left still waiting for a first goal.
Hooper released him with a terrific ball inside left-back Ben Gordon and McGinn was in on Bell again. This time he hit the target - and the keeper.
Bell came to the rescue again a couple of minutes later after Alexei Eremenko of all people was guilty of surrendering possession 25 yards from his own goal. That allowed James Forrest - back in the fold for the first time in three months - to smash a fine shot goalwards only for the keeper to make a fine block.
Daniel Majstorovic was inches wide with a header from a Ki Sung-Yeung corner and the Korean was equally unlucky with a free-kick that flew just over but somehow Kilmarnock, who had not strung together two passes, were still level.
Celtic were dealt a massive blow just after half an hour when Hooper went down after a tangle with Wright.
It looked innocuous but the striker signalled to the bench he was in trouble and after receiving lengthy treatment he was strapped on to a stretcher and led away to be replaced by Anthony Stokes.
The play continued to flow towards Bell after the break but Celtic's intensity had waned and Lennon was increasingly agitated. His mood was to get much worse in 54 minutes as Celtic's defence allowed Sammon to run 40 yards unmolested to score an incredible opener.
Sammon is in the form of his life but his 15th goal of the season was something special. Killie had been defending a corner when Mehdi Taouil got hold of the ball and found the Irishman.
He ran in behind Cha Du-Ri, shrugged of a weak challenge from Emilio Izaguirre and found himself one on one with Fraser Forster.
The finish, to the side of the keeper from an angle, was that of a supremely confident striker.
It was time for serious action from Celtic and Scott Brown was thrown in after 66 minutes to replace the totally ineffectual Ledley.
There was mounting venom in the stands and the sight of Sammon cutting inside Majstorovic easily and stabbing in another shot, saved this time, almost tipped the home support over the edge.
As Celtic's confidence evaporated, Killie's grew. They knocked the ball about well and 20 minutes from time Lennon hooked McGinn for Paddy McCourt.
But it was Daryl Murphy who had the chance to level but scooped the ball over with 14 minutes left. It was another example of Celtic's lack of ruthlessness.
History was crooking its finger in Kilmarnock's direction and beckoning them towards it but they couldn't embrace the moment. With five minutes left they cracked and Celtic equalised.
Jamie Hamill fouled Izaguirre and Ki fired the free-kick to the back post where Rogne rose to bullet home the leveller.
Celtic had claims for a handball on the edge of the box ignored and Sammon burst out to round Forster at the other end, with only Majstorovic's lunge on the line preventing Killie winning it.

description.hltext_display: Variációk Audi R8-ra
description.content: Az Audi R8-as talán kilóg a szuperautók közül, mert remek hétköznapi használhatósággal, és alapáron csak V8-as erőforrással rendelkezik, de a normál személyautók felől közelítve még így is egy másik kategória. Vételár tekintetében is. Audi R8 limuzin az elszántaknak A második már némi kézügyességet igényel, leginkább a műanyag szobrászkodás területén. Aki elég elszánt, és van egy felesleges Audi A8-asa, akár R8 limuzint is építhet magának, mint azt ez a kanadai példány is tanúsítja. Az arányok nem stimmelnek, és valójában csak a fényszórók miatt lehet rámondani az egészre, hogy R8-as, de akkor is: a ponyvával ellentétben legalább működik.

description.hltext_display: Rangers & Celtic hit back at Aberdeen chief Willie Miller's accusations of poaching young players
description.content:
By Craig Swan THE Old Firm last night hit back at Aberdeen hero Willie Miller as a war of words erupted between the clubs.
Celtic youth chief Chris McCart furiously defended his club in the wake of accusations from the Dons' director of football while Rangers' Academy boss Jimmy Sinclair also waded in.
Miller lit the touchpaper when he accused Celtic and Rangers of trying to tap up and poach Aberdeen's stars of the future.
The Pittodrie club plough �500,000 each year into their youth development programme and Miller insisted the investment has paid off.
But Miller also told Dons shareholders it is a continual struggle to fend off the Glaswegian predators.
Miller, who has seen the emergence of Chris Maguire, Peter Pawlett, Fraser Fyvie, Ryan Jack and Clark Robertson since taking over his role six years ago, said: "This is the best crop of young players in Scotland.
"That has taken a lot of work from everyone involved to make sure we keep these young players.
"Believe me, it is a tough environment for these kids at 14. Rangers and Celtic are constantly at our games, trying to tap up our players and steal them away.
"We have top players at under-16 level and everyone in British football, not just in Scotland, is chasing them.
"We have to work hard with the boys and thei r parents to get them to believe when I tell them not to go to Rangers and Celtic, but to come to Aberdeen.
"Here they can see a pathway to the first team but I have to make them realise if you go to these other clubs you won't get a chance.
"The reason I do it is to make sure there is a future for the club with the young players we have developed."
McCart - head of youth at Parkhead - said: "This is absolute nonsense and we are very disappointed at these accusations .
"Celtic conducts itself with absolute integrity in terms of the recruitment of players.
"We are not aware of any issues whatsoever with Aberdeen FC and do not understand why these comments have been made."
Sinclair said: "Any dealings we have had with Aberdeen regarding the recruitment of young players has been in accordance with SPL and SFA regulations.
"We would give Willie the benefit of the doubt in his language used to shareholders as I think he would be the first to acknowledge that he would be unable to substantiate any irregularity on the part of Rangers."

description.hltext_display: La ville de Bienne rend hommage à Nicolas G. Hayek
description.content:
C’est officiel, la ville de Bienne en Suisse (là où se trouve le siège du Swatch Group) va rendre hommage à Nicolas G. Hayek, fondateur du célèbre groupe horloger décédé en juin 2010, en baptisant une rue et un parc à son nom.
Juin 2010 : le monde de l’horlogerie suisse vient de perdre l’homme qui sauva cette industrie de la faillite dans les années 70/80.
En effet, Nicolas G. Hayek, l’incontournable patron du Swatch Group vient de décéder d’une crise cardiaque à l’âge de 82 ans.
Décembre 2010 : la ville de Bienne, là où se trouve le siège social du Swatch Group, vient d’annoncer dans la presse helvétique qu’une rue (située près de nouveaux bâtiments Omega) et qu’un parc (situé aux Prés-de-la-Rive) porteraient prochainement le nom de Nicolas G. Hayek.
